content: --वासिन् (°ते°) {%<ab>a.</ab>%} dwelling near the frontiers, dwelling close by. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} [अंते गुरुसमीपे वस्तुं शीलं यस्य] {1} a pupil (who always dwells near his master to receive instruction); <ls>P. IV. 3. 104</ls>; <ls n="P.">VI. 2. 36.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 33.</ls> {2} a chāṇḍāla (who dwells at the extremity of a village).
